name: linkinator
description: Find broken links, missing images, etc in your HTML. Scurry around your site and find all those broken links.
author: Justin Beckwith

scripts.build-binaries: bun build ./build/src/cli.js --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun --outfile ./build/binaries/linkinator-linux && bun build ./build/src/cli.js --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-windows --outfile ./build/binaries/linkinator-win.exe && bun build ./build/src/cli.js --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin --outfile ./build/binaries/linkinator-macos
